data.message:
You been my idol since day one
Your the best rapper ever 
Your raps explain stories and deep thoughts they actually mean something unlike kanye and lil wayne they dont know nothin. Your new music aint the same, to bad people gotta be stupid bitches and sue you right.? Like its there fault what they did. they deserve tp be put on blast and it ain't really putting them on blast its just explainimg what it was like and how you felt. I LOVE YOU.!! ❤❤❤❤ have a good dayyy.!!
